Protocols/CrystalThemeType.html#/s:7Crys.name: entry
Protocols/CrystalThemeType.html#/s:7Crys.abstract: The theme that Crystal applies to your app when the app launches.

Protocols/CrystalCompatible.html#/s:7Cry.name: Theme
Protocols/CrystalCompatible.html#/s:7Cry.abstract: The theme type that is determined when making protocol conformance.

Protocols/CrystalCompatible.html#/s:7Cry.name: cst
Protocols/CrystalCompatible.html#/s:7Cry.abstract: Crystal namespace used to expose available methods and properties.

Protocols/CrystalDetermined.html.name: CrystalDetermined
Protocols/CrystalDetermined.html.abstract: A protocol should only be adopted by Crystal class.

Protocols/CrystalCompatible.html.name: CrystalCompatible
Protocols/CrystalCompatible.html.abstract: A type that has crystal extensions. You can use cst property to get extension methods.

Classes/Crystalline.html#/s:7Crystal11Cr.name: apply(_:)
Classes/Crystalline.html#/s:7Crystal11Cr.abstract: Apply the theme to the target object in a closure.

Classes/Crystalline.html#/s:7Crystal11Cr.name: apply(key:_:)
Classes/Crystalline.html#/s:7Crystal11Cr.abstract: Apply the theme to the target object in a closure.

Classes/Crystal.html.name: Crystal
Classes/Crystal.html.abstract: The main Crystal class. Instead of creating a Crystal object, you use shared Crystal.shared singleton to manage themes.
